text: Miass River at the southwest corner of the Ob Basin (double click to expand) The Miass is a river on the eastern side of the Ural Mountains in Bashkortostan, Chelyabinsk Oblast and Kurgan Oblast, Russia. It is a right tributary of the Iset, part of the Irtysh basin.Миасс (река в Челябинской и Курганской областях), Great Soviet Encyclopedia It is long, and has a drainage basin of . The cities Chelyabinsk and Miass are located on the river. ==References== ==External links== * Sunrise photo near Chelyabinsk- NASA center Category:Rivers of Bashkortostan Category:Rivers of Chelyabinsk Oblast Category:Rivers of Kurgan Oblast Category:Ural Mountains
title: Miass (river)
